summary: Quantumoney.app & QuantumoneyAR.app: apply platform-compatible 'patch máximo realista' in stages. Current confirmed build scope is Etapas 1 e 2: (1) global UI visual refinement with fully transparent windows, thin yellow borders, yellow text, mobile-safe HUD layout; (2) new simulated map page (image + markers) for QMY coins and monsters using shared internal state to simulate site↔AR sync, with no external calls and no changes to existing functionality/footers.
architectural_notes: Sem chamadas externas (ex.: Leaflet/tiles OSM, NNS real, APIs externas); usar estado interno compartilhado para simular sincronização site ↔ app AR.
Implementação por etapas para minimizar risco: aplicar primeiro ajustes visuais/HUD, depois página de mapa simulado; não alterar funcionalidades/rodapés existentes fora do escopo.
known_issues: Build anterior do patch máximo realista falhou com erro genérico ('AI was unable to fulfill' / 'couldn't complete your request'); pode exigir dividir em etapas e simplificar escopo de build.

existing_features.title: Implement Stage 1 visual patch across the main app UI: make all in-app window/panel surfaces fully transparent with thin yellow borders and yellow text, without changing any existing page structure, routes, or feature behavior.
Preserve the existing footer exactly as-is (structure, styling, text content, links) and ensure no new 'Caffeine' references are introduced anywhere in the UI as part of Stages 1–2 changes.

Make Stage 1 mobile-safe: adjust in-app window/panel spacing and HUD placement so that HUD/XP/coins/monsters are not obscured or clipped on small screens, including safe-area insets, while keeping the same information and components.

Implement Stage 2 simulated map page behavior using an image-based map with internal-coordinate markers for QMY coins and monsters, with no Leaflet/OpenStreetMap dependency and no external geolocation or external map/network calls.

Simulate internal synchronization between the website map and the AR mode map by sharing the same internal marker/state source so actions/state changes in one view are reflected in the other (within the same user session), without introducing real-time networking.

new_feature_requests.summary: Etapa 1: Todas as janelas/HUD com transparência total, bordas finas amarelas e texto amarelo; ajustar layout (incl. mobile) para não bloquear HUD/XP/moedas/monstros sem alterar funcionalidades existentes
Etapa 2: Criar nova página de mapa simulado (imagem + marcadores) com moedas QMY e monstros em coordenadas internas, compartilhando estado interno para sincronização simulada site ↔ app AR

projectName: Stage 1+2: Transparent yellow HUD/windows + simulated image-based map with shared internal state
